purpose: Enable the creation and deployment of decentralized agents for multi-agent systems.
principle: Builds on decentralized communication protocols and agent-based modeling to facilitate agent interactions.
reusability: Highly modular with support for plug-and-play components, API integrations, and flexible agent configurations.
limitations: Primarily focused on Python environments, limited documentation on advanced use cases, and may require familiarity with decentralized systems.
name: uAgents
description: A fast and lightweight framework for creating decentralized agents with ease.
highlight: Provides a fast and lightweight framework for creating decentralized agents with ease.
